statements: SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 5;
SELECT student_name, assessment_score FROM Students ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(quiz_score) AS avg_quiz_score FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 10 AND assessment_score > 90 AND quiz_score < 70;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE assessment_score > 90 ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level BETWEEN 8 AND 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, assessment_score FROM Students WHERE assessment_score < 80 OR quiz_score > 90 ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, assessment_score, quiz_score FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 9 AND quiz_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY quiz_score DESC, assessment_score ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_level, assessment_score, quiz_score FROM Students WHERE grade_level < 8 AND student_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT name, class FROM students WHERE active = TRUE
SELECT id, name, class, active FROM students ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE score >= 90.0
SELECT student_id, AVG(score) as average_score FROM assessments GROUP BY student_id
SELECT name, class, active FROM students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, class, active FROM students WHERE class = 'Math';
SELECT id, name, class, active FROM students WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT students.name, assessments.score, assessments.submission_time FROM students JOIN assessments ON students.id = assessments.student_id WHERE assessments.score > 90;

SELECT students.name, COUNT(assessments.id) AS num_assessments FROM students LEFT JOIN assessments ON students.id = assessments.student_id GROUP BY students.name HAVING num_assessments >= 3 ORDER BY num_assessments DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;

SELECT student_name, assessment_name, total_marks FROM students JOIN quiz_scores ON students.student_id = quiz_scores.student_id JOIN assessments ON quiz_scores.assessment_id = assessments.assessment_id;

SELECT student_name, assessment_date, score FROM students JOIN quiz_scores ON students.student_id = quiz_scores.student_id JOIN assessments ON quiz_scores.assessment_id = assessments.assessment_id WHERE score > 80;

SELECT student_name, assessment_name, total_marks FROM students JOIN quiz_scores ON students.student_id = quiz_scores.student_id JOIN assessments ON quiz_scores.assessment_id = assessments.assessment_id WHERE student_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;

SELECT student_name, assessment_name, total_marks FROM students INNER JOIN quiz_scores ON students.student_id = quiz_scores.student_id INNER JOIN assessments ON quiz_scores.assessment_id = assessments.assessment_id;
SELECT assessment_name, total_marks, (score * 100 / total_marks) AS percentage FROM assessments LEFT JOIN quiz_scores ON assessments.assessment_id = quiz_scores.assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students;
SELECT assessment_type, assessment_date, total_marks FROM assessments;
SELECT quiz_type, total_questions FROM quizzes;

SELECT student_name, assessment_type, marks_obtained FROM students JOIN student_results ON students.student_id = student_results.student_id JOIN assessments ON assessments.assessment_id = student_results.assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_type, assessment_date, total_marks FROM assessments WHERE total_marks > 50;
SELECT result_id, student_id, assessment_id, quiz_id, marks_obtained FROM student_results WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY assessment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_name, start_time, end_time FROM Assessments WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, score FROM Students s JOIN StudentScores ss ON s.student_id = ss.student_id WHERE score > 80;
SELECT class_name, teacher_id, start_date, end_date FROM Classes ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE class_id = 101 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT Students.student_name, Classes.class_name, Assessments.assessment_name FROM Students INNER JOIN Classes ON Students.class_id = Classes.class_id INNER JOIN Assessments ON Classes.class_id = Assessments.class_id;

SELECT Students.student_name, StudentScores.score FROM Students INNER JOIN StudentScores ON Students.student_id = StudentScores.student_id WHERE Students.class_id = 103 ORDER BY StudentScores.score DESC;
SELECT class_name, start_date, end_date FROM Classes WHERE teacher_id = 201 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
